entry.string: The LogConfig Module controls the Xaraya logging system.
From the menu, you have three choices.
entry.translation: Das Men√º bietet Ihnen drei Optionen.

entry.string: Add logger -- Allows you add a new logger to the configuration.
List loggers -- List the loggers that are currently configured.
Turn logging on/off -- Makes Xaraya log according to the loggers configured or not.

If the logging is set to off in this module (if this module is not active, it turns off logging automatically) and there is no logging configuration in config.system.php (old configuration style) then there is a fallback system that will log to var/logs/log.txt whenever it is present .
Further information on the LogConfig module can be found at
Click on Version History tab at the bottom to get the latest release information.
Related tutorials and documentation on LogConfig found at
